name: Emblem of Severed Fate
title: Emblem of Severed Fate: Ornate Kabuto
desc: Thirteen years went by like a dream.\nThe scarlet snow flies through the shadowed pass like smoke.\nYou have now gone afar.
inPlayDescription: After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.The DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2 (once per Round).

skills.desc: After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.The DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2 (once per Round).(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
